name: CommPeak
tag_list: wholesale-voip-termination, voice-origination, toll-free-origination, voip-sms-messages, voip-termination, voice-termination, voip-services, wholesale-voip-services, a-z-voip-termination, termination-for-voip-providers
overview:
CommPeak Ltd. offers wholesale VoIP termination services to providers, call centers and businesses worldwide.

Founded by former IT professionals, CommPeak offers reliable, carrier-grade VoIP termination solutions via its network which has fully redundant POPs in seven different global locations.

In addition to VoIP termination services, CommPeak offers voice origination, toll-free DIDs and bulk SMS messaging services to a variety of market segments including call centers, SMBs and enterprises, VoIP providers, independent software vendors (ISV’s) and calling card operators.

CommPeak also features a partnership program which calls for business collaborations with resellers, carriers and providers.

offices.address1: St. John's Building (6th Floor), 33 Garden Road, Central
